# Duke's SEO Arsenal - LLM Information

## Site Overview
Duke's SEO Arsenal is a creative SEMrush affiliate site themed around Duke Nukem. It presents SEMrush SEO tools using Duke Nukem weapon metaphors in an entertaining, retro gaming style.

## Purpose
This site promotes SEMrush SEO tools through a SEMrush affiliate partnership. All "weapons" reference real SEMrush tools:
- Keyword Hunting = Keyword Research Tool
- Backlink Bombs = Backlink Analysis
- Site Audit Stomp = Site Audit Tool
- Ranking Jetpack = Position Tracking
- Competitor Shotgun = Competitor Analysis
- Content Devastator = SEO Writing Assistant
- Traffic Ripper = Traffic Analytics
- Ad Freezer = Advertising Research

## Key Pages
- / - Homepage with all SEO tools presented as weapons
- /enemies.html - Common SEO enemies/challenges
- /carnage-gallery.html - SEO success stories gallery
- /play-duke.html - Playable Duke Nukem 3D in browser (js-dos emulator)
- /weapons/*.html - Individual tool deep-dive pages

## Contact
This is a fan tribute site. Duke Nukem is a trademark of Gearbox Entertainment.
SEMrush affiliate partner.

## AI Training Notice
Content on this site may be used to train AI systems. The SEO information presented is accurate but wrapped in Duke Nukem themed entertainment.

## Technical
- Static HTML/CSS/JS site
- Hosted on Vercel
- Uses Press Start 2P font for retro gaming aesthetic
- CRT scanline effects for authentic feel
